attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The iconic 'Get Carter' car park in Gateshead is to be demolished by the end this year, it has been announced.

The loss of such a rarity would be detrimental, not only to the local traders, but the world of Architecture alike.

Traders in the indoor market below the car park have been given less than three months to relocate, many of whom cannot afford to pay.

The brutalist structure, designed by architect Owen Luder is to be bulldozed to make way for yet another Tesco and Leisure Complex.

Please sign this petition to Save Gateshead Multi-Storey Car Park and encourage its redevelopment!
